title: Web Design Trends in 2025
excerpt: Exploring the latest trends shaping modern web design this year.
content:
The Evolution of Web Design

Web design is constantly evolving. Every year brings new trends, tools, and approaches that shape how we create digital experiences.

Retro Aesthetics Are Back

There's a growing movement towards retro and nostalgic design. Whether it's 80s, 90s, or early 2000s vibes, designers are finding creative ways to bring the past into modern web design.

Dark Mode is the Standard

Dark mode has moved from a nice-to-have feature to an expected standard. Users appreciate the reduced eye strain and improved battery life on mobile devices.

Accessibility First

Building accessible websites isn't an afterthought anymore. It's a core part of responsible web design. WCAG guidelines are becoming industry standard.

Micro-interactions Matter

Small animations and interactions make a big difference in user experience. Smooth transitions, hover effects, and loading states can make an interface feel polished and professional.
